Key Match Events: Brayan Rocchio drove in four runs and hit a two-run home run in the sixth inning
Tommy Pham failed to tag up at third base leading to a critical opportunity for the Guardians
Rocchio added a bases-loaded walk in the eighth inning for four RBIs
Post-Match Reflections: Matt Quatraro missed the game due to his mother's passing, with Paul Hoover serving as acting manager
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Kauffman Stadium with a crowd of 14,813
Tanner Bibee allowed one run in six innings and was praised for his performance in high-pressure situations
